original_text: God said, ‘Different kinds of animals will now appear on the land. There will be farm animals and wild animals. There will also be other small animals that move along the ground. There will be many kinds of animals and each kind will be different.’
korean_text: 하나님이 이르시되 땅은 생물을 그 종류대로 내되 가축과 기는 것과 땅의 짐승을 종류대로 내라 하시니 그대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: Different kinds of animals will now appear on the land
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 땅에 여러 종류의 동물이 나타날 것이다

sentences.original_text: There will also be other small animals
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 다른 작은 동물들도 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: There will be many kinds of animals
and each kind will be different
